text: Hey <@U04DLJH3W94>, how's it going with the fix on HubL expressions in rich text?

Hey guys, I’m building a calculator in React and my current setup looks like this:
-- partial with App?island;
-- App (container for all the other components)
---- SliderInput1
---- SliderInput2
---- SliderInput3
---- Results

This works fine, I’m lifting state up from the SliderInputs components to the App, where I made the calculations and I’m updating the Results component.

My next step was to make all the text of the calculator editable from the HubSpot Edit Page via a module or multiple modules. This is where I’m blocked. I was expecting an easy way to have modules in partials or an easy way to share module data between components in a partial.

I tried to transform a SliderInput component into a module, but it’s losing the interactivity (slider range movement).
It's going well, changes are being reviewed. working towards getting it out
That's great news! Could you let me know when the fix is out?
